    • parseLong

      public static long parseLong(String s)
      Parse the string as a number and returns its value. If the string starts with "0x", the number is parsed in base 16, otherwise base 10.
      Parameters:
      s - the string to be parsed
      Returns:
      the numeric value represented by the string.

    • parseHexLong

      public static long parseHexLong(String s)
      Parse the string as a number and returns its value. The number is always parsed in base 16. The string can start as an option with "0x".
      Parameters:
      s - the string to be parsed in base 16
      Returns:
      the numeric value represented by the string.

    • toString

      public static String toString(InputStream inputStream, boolean close) throws IOException
      Reads input-stream i into a String with the UTF-8 charset until the input-stream is finished (don't use with infinite streams).
      Parameters:
      inputStream - to read into a string
      close - if true, close the input-stream
      Returns:
      a string
      Throws:
      IOException - the io exception
